iOS 17.0+iPadOS 17.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 14.0+tvOS 17.0+visionOSwatchOS 10.0+

```
static func buildBlock<C0, C1, C2, C3, C4, C5, C6, C7>(
    _ c0: C0,
    _ c1: C1,
    _ c2: C2,
    _ c3: C3,
    _ c4: C4,
    _ c5: C5,
    _ c6: C6,
    _ c7: C7
) -> some AppShortcutOptionsCollectionSpecification<Value> where C0 : AppShortcutOptionsCollectionProtocol, C1 : AppShortcutOptionsCollectionProtocol, C2 : AppShortcutOptionsCollectionProtocol, C3 : AppShortcutOptionsCollectionProtocol, C4 : AppShortcutOptionsCollectionProtocol, C5 : AppShortcutOptionsCollectionProtocol, C6 : AppShortcutOptionsCollectionProtocol, C7 : AppShortcutOptionsCollectionProtocol

```

Available when `Value` conforms to `_IntentValue`.
